definition: man-eating (beast)/to eat people/fig. to oppress the people
lit. not eating the food of common mortals/fig. placing oneself above the common populace
pinyin: bu4 shi2 ren2 jian1 yan1 huo3

definition: lit. to lead beasts to eat the people (idiom); fig. tyrannical government oppresses the people
man-eating shark/same as 大白鯊|大白鲨[da4 bai2 sha1], great white shark (Carcharodon carcharias)

sentences.english: And a piranha 's a fish, just like your present.
sentences.chinese: 食人魚也是一種魚，就像你的生日禮物一樣。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the pathomorphological characteristics of acute bromadiolone poisoning in guinea pigs.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察豚鼠食人溴敵隆急性中毒的病理形態學特點。

sentences.english: In a last ditch effort at survival, they became cannibals.
sentences.chinese: 爲了求生而最後一搏，他們成爲食人族。

sentences.english: Cannibals captured him and took them to their village.
sentences.chinese: 那裏食人肉的野蠻人抓住了他，把他帶到住處。

sentences.english: Discussed will be some infamous cannibals of history.
sentences.chinese: 我們以後還會討論關於一些臭名昭著的食人的歷史。

sentences.english: Packer is called the cannibal of Colorado.
sentences.chinese: Packer被稱爲卡羅拉多的食人者。

sentences.english: Five cannibals get appointed as engineers in a defense company. During the
sentences.chinese: 五食人族被任命爲一家國防公司的工程師。

sentences.english: We caught piranhas and smoked them over a fire.
sentences.chinese: 我們抓住食人魚，將它們架在火上烘烤。

sentences.english: Haley Starshine:Besides, it was kinda fun, and we got to beat up some ogres.
sentences.chinese: 另外，這很有趣啊，而且我們狠揍了幾個食人魔。

sentences.english: BARBARA KLEIN: Piranhas are known as dangerous, meat-eating fish.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，食人魚是一種危險的食肉魚。

sentences.english: Also the Ocra whales would have been detected by the Russian sonar if they were nearby.
sentences.chinese: 而且，如果食人鯨接近潛水艇，聲納會發現他們。

sentences.english: BOB DOUGHTY: At first the scientists thought the fish made just this one sound.
sentences.chinese: 起初，科學家們以爲食人魚只會發出這一種聲音。

sentences.english: Stromgarde forces lead an unsuccessful assassination attempt on Ogre-mage Cho'Gall.
sentences.chinese: 斯托姆加德王國的部隊試圖暗殺食人魔法師仇高。

sentences.english: Without his tooth, Frolg is not welcome back in Ogre camp.
sentences.chinese: 沒有了牙，弗羅格沒法回到食人魔羣中。

sentences.english: Arrow-shooting is a normal skill for the cannibals, with it, they can hunt wild pigs.
sentences.chinese: 射箭是食人族平常必須訓練的技能，獵殺山豬就靠它。

sentences.english: He found himself was surrounded by men who eat human.
sentences.chinese: 突然發現自己被食人族重重包圍。

definition: jackal and wolf/ravenous wolf/fig. evil person/vicious tyrant
